column4: I have an ASUS M2NPV-VM motherboard, and suspend/resume doesn't work on Ubuntu 7.10, 8.04, 8.10, or 9.04. The last Ubuntu version it worked on was 7.04. I have reinstalled every time since. How can I debug the problem?
I have run the checkbox suspend debug script, but it doesn't even pass the first test, nor does it generate an apport report like it's supposed to.
Windows can suspend fine, so why is Linux so crap on my system?
